ARABIC: هَٰذَا بَصَٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُوقِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is clear insight for mankind and guidance and mercy for people with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: These are precepts of wisdom for men, and guidance and grace for people who believe with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the lights of discernment for people and guidance and mercy for those endowed with sure faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This (Quran) is an enlightenment for the people and a guide and mercy for the people who have strong faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is an enlightenment for mankind, and a guidance and mercy for the people of faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is a clear insight and evidence for mankind, and a guidance and a mercy for people who have faith with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are clear proofs for men, and a guidance and a mercy for a people who are sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is clear proofs for men, and a guidance, and a mercy to a people having sure faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is clear indication for mankind, and a guidance and a mercy for a folk whose faith is sure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This [Book] brings enlightenment and guidance to mankind, and is a blessing for those who have firm faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This Book is an enlightenment Unto mankind and a guidance, and a mercy Unto a People who are convinced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: These are eye-openers for mankind, and guidance and mercy for a people who have certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: These are clear evidences to men and a Guidance and Mercy to those of assured Faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This (Quran) is a clear insight and evidence for mankind, and a guidance and a mercy for people who have Faith with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: These are clear proofs for people, a guidance, and mercy for those who are certain (of the Resurrection) in belief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is an illumination for mankind, and guidance, and mercy for people who believe with certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This [Qur'an] is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain [in faith].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [45:20] This, Qur’ān, is [a set of] insights for mankind, guideposts with which they can discern [God’s] rulings and legal proscriptions, and guidance and mercy for a people who have certainty, with regard to the [truth of the] Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This) Qur'an (is clear indication for mankind, and a guidance) from error (and a mercy) preventing from chastisement (for a folk whose faith is sure) for people who believe in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an.
